title: Ebola cases and deaths in West African outbreak by country 2016
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of cases/deaths on the Y-axis for 11 different Countrys for 2 groups Cases, and Deaths that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Total had the maximum Number of cases/deaths among all 2 groups, and it was for Cases. The minimum Number of cases/deaths was observed in Country Senegal for Deaths.
There is a gap of 11323.0 between the highest and lowest Number of cases/deaths found for Deaths in Country Total and Senegal.
On average, the Country Total had the highest Number of cases/deaths for all 2 groups Cases, and Deaths. Whereas Senegal had the lowest average Number of cases/deaths.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of cases/deaths on the Y-axis for 11 different Countrys for 2 groups Cases, and Deaths that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Total had the maximum Number of cases/deaths among all 2 groups, and it was for Cases. The minimum Number of cases/deaths was observed in Country Senegal for Deaths.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of cases/deaths on the Y-axis for 11 different Countrys for 2 groups Cases, and Deaths that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Total had the maximum Number of cases/deaths among all 2 groups, and it was for Cases. The minimum Number of cases/deaths was observed in Country Senegal for Deaths.
There is a gap of 11323.0 between the highest and lowest Number of cases/deaths found for Deaths in Country Total and Senegal.
On average, the Country Total had the highest Number of cases/deaths for all 2 groups Cases, and Deaths. Whereas Senegal had the lowest average Number of cases/deaths.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 11 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Cases, and Deaths. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of cases/deaths.
Country Total had the maximum Number of cases/deaths among all 2 groups, and it was for Cases. The minimum Number of cases/deaths was observed in Country Senegal for Deaths.
Among all the Countrys, Deaths had the highest Number of cases/deaths in Country Total and lowest Number of cases/deaths in Country Senegal.
There is a gap of 11323.0 between the highest and lowest Number of cases/deaths found for Deaths in Country Total and Senegal.
Among all 2 groups, Cases had the gap of 28645.0 between the maximum and minimum Number of cases/deaths observed in Country Total and Senegal respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups Cases, and Deaths, the Country Total is the maximum Number of cases/deaths and Senegal is the minimum Number of cases/deaths.
